Photo / Alex Burton
Coroner finds Ōtaki pilot Nigel Frederickson died in crash after propeller fell off of aircraft https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/coroner-finds-otaki-pilot-nigel-frederickson-died-in-crash-after-propeller-fell-off-of-aircraft/YYK6B4ZNJNHTFINZ3DMDU7KPBM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/coroner-finds-otaki-pilot-nigel-frederickson-died-in-crash-after-propeller-fell-off-of-aircraft/YYK6B4ZNJNHTFINZ3DMDU7KPBM/ Ric StevensHe had installed a new propeller two hours before the accident. Wed, 18 Dec 2024 02:32:53 +0000 The Sonex home-built plane Nigel Frederickson was flying when the propeller fell off on August 17, 2020. Frederickson died in the crash. The photo is taken from the Civil Aviation Authority's air accident report.
